question.text:
Sexual reproduction, when compared to asexual reproduction, is a

A. Slow process
B. Fast process
C. Simple process
D. Complex process

options.text: <math><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mo> </mo><mo> </mo><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi><mo> </mo><mo> </mo><mi mathvariant="normal">D</mi><mo> </mo><mo> </mo><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi></math>

<math><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mo> </mo><mo> </mo><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi><mo> </mo><mo> </mo><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mo> </mo><mo> </mo><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi></math>

<math><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi><mo> </mo><mo> </mo><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi><mo> </mo><mo> </mo><mi mathvariant="normal">D</mi><mo> </mo><mo> </mo><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi></math>

<math><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi><mo> </mo><mo> </mo><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi><mo> </mo><mo> </mo><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mo> </mo><mo> </mo><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi></math>

solution.text: Sexual reproduction involves the formation of male and female gametes either by the same individual or a different individual. The gamete fuses to form the zygote which develops to form a new organisms. It is elaborate, complex, and slow process as compared to asexual reproduction.
